sections.purpose: To rapidly mix small volumes of liquids in tubes by creating a vortex.
sections.scope: Applicable to resuspension and mixing tasks in Microbiology.
procedure: Place the vortex mixer on a stable, level surface.
Hold the tube securely and press the bottom against the rubber cup or platform.
Allow mixing for the required time until contents are homogeneous.
Remove the tube and place the mixer in standby or OFF position after use.
precautions: Ensure tube caps are tightly closed to prevent leakage and aerosols.
Avoid applying excessive force that might break the tube.
Clean any spills on the platform immediately.
Disconnect from power before cleaning or servicing.
